btv.event.peer

Class PeerConnectionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • btv.event.peer.PeerConnectionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PeerConnectionEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    This class represents a Peer connection event. When our listener receives this event our visualization will be updated based on the connection state of the peer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Fields inherited from class java.util.EventObject

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connected()
      Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is connected.
      boolean connecting()
      Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is connecting
      boolean disconnected()
      Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is disconnecting.
      java.lang.String getIP()
      Returns the IP address of the Peer associated with this event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PeerConnectionEvent

        public PeerConnectionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                   java.lang.String i,
                   boolean connecting1,
                   boolean connected1,
                   boolean disconnected1)
        Constructor to set up a new PeerConnectionEvent
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the connection event.
        i - The ip address of the peer who caused the connection event.
        connecting1 - Will be set to true if the Peer is establishing a connection.
        connected1 - Will be set to true if the Peer has successfully connected.
        disconnected1 - Will be set to true if the Peer has been disconnected.

    • Method Detail

      • connecting

        public boolean connecting()
        Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is connecting
        Returns:
        True if the Peer associated with this event is connecting , false otherwise

      • connected

        public boolean connected()
        Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is connected.
        Returns:
        True if the Peer associated with this event is connected, false otherwise.

      • disconnected

        public boolean disconnected()
        Returns true if this event describes a Peer that is disconnecting.
        Returns:
        True if the Peer associated with this event is disconnecting, false otherwise.

      • getIP

        public java.lang.String getIP()
        Returns the IP address of the Peer associated with this event.
        Returns:
        The IP address of the peer associated with this event.
